titleStmt.title: The coming of God in mercy, in vengeance; beginning with fire, to convert, or consume, at this so sinful city London: oh! London, London.
titleStmt.author: Gostelo, Walter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the authour Walter Gostelo, dwelling in Broad-street London.,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
